com.abmash.api.browser

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.abmash.api.browser.Window

  • public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
    Interaction with browser windows, used by calling Browser.window().

    This class is used to create, close and refresh browser windows and to switch between them. In addition, it supports the detection of popups and alerts.

    Author:
    Alper Ortac

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Window(Browser browser)
      Constructs new BrowserWindow instance to interact with browser windows.

      • closeAllPopups

        public void closeAllPopups()
        Closes all popup windows (all windows except the initial main window). Exits the browser application if the main window was closed beforehand.

      • closePopup

        public void closePopup(Popup popup)
        Closes specified popup. Exits the browser application if it was the last open window.
        Parameters:
        popup -

      • closeWindow

        public void closeWindow(java.lang.String windowHandle)
        Closes window with specified handle. Exits the browser application if it was the last open window.
        Parameters:
        windowHandle -
